speaker: Wenxin Wei
title: The AI Show: Ep 54 | Building NLP models with Azure ML AutoML
description:
Wenxin Wei and Lifeng Wei are here to run through an E2E demo of building NLP models with Azure ML AutoML. They'll go into detail about Text Classification, Multi-class and Multi-label and Text Named Entity Recognition (NER) and how it now supports 104 languages! https://aka.ms/automl-nlp

Jump to:
00:00 Welcome to the AI Show 
01:00 What is AutoML NLP
03:19 Multi-lingual support
04:28 E2E user-experience
13:00 Learn more

Recommended resources:
AutoML NLP https://aka.ms/automl-nlp
Multi-class examples https://aka.ms//AutoML/Multiclass
Multi-label examples https://aka.ms/AutoML/Multilabel
Naming Entity Recognition examples https://aka.ms/AutoML/NER
